author: jainshilpi
body:
This PR updates the UL2017 and 2018 scale and smearing corrections for nanoAOD. A few updates to:
(1) nano_cff.py
(2) photon_cff.py
(3) electron_cff.py

All runTheMatrix runs fine. Also tested on 136.8522 which was not included in the limited runTheMatrix.py. 

@mariadalfonso
title: UL scale and smearing for nanoAOD photons and electrons (2017 and 2018)
